name: WI Games widget Plugin
author: WI Games

sections.description:
WI Games Widget plug-in is created to simplify installation of a widget which will allow your users to play hundreds of fascinating games without leaving your site as much as possible, and at the same time to gain additional income having placed in it the advertizing codes. (More info http://wi-games.com)

How To

After installation and activation of a plug-in you need to insert a code similar to this

<script type="text/javascript" src="http://output.js.wigames.net/?hash=717109d9d379a24131347c7a0ecf3fd4"></script>

Where to get a code

To receive a code you need to become authorized (http://backend.wigames.net/login/) or to create a new account (http://backend.wigames.net/register/) in the WI Games service.

Further you will be able to add a domain having entered it in the corresponding line. After check of your domain on compliance to requirements to platforms it will receive the status “active” and control of a widget and monetization will be available to you.

If you have already added the domain and it has the status “active” press the Widget button near the corresponding domain.

!Attention! All settings of positioning and size of the button of a call of a widget are made from the control panel of the webmaster.

After a widget code insert in a plug-in on the page of its settings (/wp-admin/admin.php? page=wi-games-settings) keep changes having pressed the Submit button.
sections.installation:
1. Go to your admin area and select Plugins -> Add new from the menu.
  2. Search for “WI Games Plugin”.
  3. Click install.
  4. Click activate.

Alternatively you can install the plugin manually.

  1. Get an archive with the most recent version of WI-Games.
  2. Uncompress the wi-games directory from the archive to your wp-content/plugins directory.
  3. Activate the plugin in the administration panel.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.2

  • Locale path fix

Version 1.0.1

  • Admin graphic and css added

Version 1.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: This plugin will help you to smoothly integrate WI Games widget to your website.
